clock.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 import numpy
00005 import time
00006 
00007 from rosgraph_msgs.msg import Clock
00008 
00009 class clock:
00010         def __init__(self):
00011                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param('simRate')
00012                 self.counter = 0
00013                 self.time = rospy.Time.from_sec(0)
00014                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher('/clock', Clock)
00015                 
00016 
00017 if __name__=='__main__':
00018         try:
00019                 rospy.init_node('clockNode')
00020                 C = clock()
00021                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00022                         C.pub.publish(C.time)
00023                         C.counter += 1
00024                         C.time = rospy.Time.from_sec(C.counter*C.dt)
00025                         time.sleep(0.1) #Does not inherit from rospy, does not obey simulation clock
00026                         #Must be >self.dt
00027         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00028                 pass
